text: The purpose of this experiment was to evaluate editing efficacy at another target locus with this RNP delivery strategy. In the revised manuscript, we now state,

Figure 3e , when the authors quantified the transduction efficiency of GFP by CPP-ELD peptide, it is not clear to me what the calculated transduction efficiency is referring to (ciliated cells? Goblet cells? Both?). Please clarify. It seems that cell-type specific antibodies were not used for this based on the image provided. What is the reason for this?
